# Getting Started

This guide helps you get started with our product.

## Installation

Install using the standard package manager:

```bash
go get github.com/example/product
```

## Quick Start

Here's a quick example to get you started:

```go
package main

import "github.com/example/product"

func main() {
    product.Run()
}
```

## Features

- Easy to use
- Fast performance
- Great documentation
